long_description: The Kurgo Pet door guards help keep dirty, furry paws from damaging your car door's interior surface when your slobbery, window-climbing friend rides along. This waterproof pair of guards is easy to install; they provide universal coverage, adjusting to fit large or small vehicles. Attach by simply sliding tabs between the window and door panel. Storage pockets hold all kinds of essentials for road-tripping canines. The Kurgo Pet door guards are machine washable, and sold as a pair.
short_description: The Kurgo Pet door guards help keep dirty, furry paws from damaging your car door's interior surface when your slobbery, window-climbing friend rides along.
